creditline: Gift of Ellen and Fred Wells
description: portrait (bijin-ga), mica background; standing woman seen from back, adjusting the back of her hair with a comb; orange and yellow patterned kimono; black, white, green and maroon striped obi
marks: 昭和二年 {Shōwa ninen} (1927) 深水畫 {Shinsui ga} (picture by Shinsui)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper with mica
title: Long Undergarments
